ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: So when the stars are extinguished,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Then the stars will lose their light.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So when the lights of the stars are put out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Then when the stars lose their lights.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So when the stars are made to lose their light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: When the stars shall be extinguished,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: So when the stars are put out,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: When the stars lose their light,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: When the stars are blotted out
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Then when the stars become dim;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Then when the stars lose their lights;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: So when the stars are obliterated
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [77:8] So when the stars are obliterated, [when] their light is extinguished,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: Allah then showed when this will be, saying: (So when the stars are put out) when the light of the stars is gone,
